short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parallel wallet to help you manage your polkadot assets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parallel wallet is the non-custodial multichain wallet extension of Parallel Finance - the DeFi Super Dapp protocol. The wallet is developed to give users a one-stop DeFi experience by allowing them to create and manage their private keys, send and receive funds and sign transactions on any DApp in a decentralized fashion.
